title: Bud Stuy
description: A short-lived but fiercely loved stoner buddy comedy.
quote: I have a dream. It’s up to me to follow it. And then I’m gonna get smacked.
altHero: two buds admire a weed gummy
alt1: one bud excitedly talking in the entry of an apartment
alt2: two buds talk in front of a window
alt3: the other bud looks at the sky in desperation
alt4: the first bud thinks while holding a bag of weed gummies
